term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - breeze in atmospheric chemistry
term.title: breeze

item.text: A term sometimes used to describe very fine particles of coke. Also a meteorological term for a gentle wind.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 2167. 'Glossary of atmospheric chemistry terms (Recommendations 1990)' on page 2177 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062112167)
